list_definition.definition: a pad of sponge, or a bunch of pieces of coarse string or yarn etc, fixed on a handle, for washing floors, dishes etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He gave the floor a quick mop.

list_definition.definition: to rub or wipe with a mop
to wipe or clean (eg a face covered with sweat)
